comment.author: 34354517@N08
comment._content:
Voss railroad (Vossebanen) is not along the Hardanger fjord. 
I think this picture shows Evanger Lake just before Evanger village direction Voss.

comment.author: 34267200@N05
comment._content:
Vossebanen is a part of the main railroad between Oslo and Bergen.
Vossebanen (Bergen-Voss) Open in 1883.
